original_text: And I will surely hide my face in that day for all the evils which they shall have wrought, in that they are turned unto other gods.
korean_text: 또 그들이 돌이켜 다른 신들을 따르는 모든 악행으로 말미암아 내가 그 때에 반드시 내 얼굴을 숨기리라

sentences.original_text: And I will surely hide my face
for all the evils which they shall have wrought
in that they are turned unto other gods
